ygData.subject: Re: Finally...
ygData.msgSnippet: Today I also made gnomish fireworks. I was a little pissed that they totally suck so I petitioned a GM. He went ahead and summoned the items to make fireworks
ygData.messageBody:
Today I also made gnomish fireworks. I was a little pissed that they
totally suck so I petitioned a GM. He went ahead and summoned the items to
make fireworks and made some. The reply I got from him after he tried them
out was "That totally sucked! I shall see to it that the game developers get
a nice little letter concearning gnomish fireworks". So I hope this helps. I
think that all of you should petition in game about the firewors sucking.
Maybe they will feel sorry for us little old gnomes and decide to make the
fireworks look better. The more petitions they get, the better the chances
of that happening. I'm crossing my fingers.

Brillian Novaspire
29th Wizard
Solusek Ro



----- Original Message -----
From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 7:56 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Finally...


> From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
>
> I've been wanting this formula for a long time, and Luke has been looking
> even longer.
>
> 3 rods and some gnomish bolts
>
> go figure eh?
>
> Interesting to note, I went through the database and noticed someone had
> tried 2 rods and gnomish bolts, that was the closest anyone came. I think
> I'l keep the excel format of the database though, just as a tribute to all
> those who tried or emailed me or submitted info in one way or another.
>
> I was disappointed in the fireworks to, I mean, one little teeny tiny PFFT
> and thats it? I guess if you have 20 or 30 people and they all go PFFT at
> the same time that might be kind of nice, but I'd be embarassed to show up
> at a wedding, promise everyone a gnomish fireworks display, and all I get
> is a PFFT.
>
> But I got my pole, and after 3 attempts I got a spyglass, so I'm a happy
> gnome now, I'll tinker myself some bait and go fishing at the pool in
> qeynos. Maybe I'll get lucky and fish up a Kiolindl fish. heh heh
>
> Rotgut
>
> Also known as Pahbi of Solusek Ro.
>
>
